name: Under Ground Storage
desc:
The is an underground base deep down this planet, the resource reserves allow it to self-sustain several cycles without outside connection.

Provides stability bonus to the colony

name: Military Zone
desc: A military restricted colony, denying all needs to <Drag> <Luxuries> <Organs>, the max num of industries <+2>

name: Space Farm
desc:
This place has a artifact ecosystem, with inputting energy and inorganic compounds, it can continuously produce organic production

Provides <Food> <Organic> production according to colony size

name: Extinctive Virus
desc:
The environment is ruined by a synthetic virus aimed destroying all organic life, all outdoor activities must be conducted under full protection

Greatly decrease production of all industries
